00040 /* Turn on proc debug interface to allow OSS and
00041  * MDS nodes to configure nodemap independently of
00042  * MGS (since the nodemap distribution is not written
00043  * yet */
00044 #define NODEMAP_PROC_DEBUG 1

00055 static int nodemap_idmap_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00056 {
00057         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap;
00058         struct lu_idmap         *idmap;
00059         struct rb_node          *node;
00060         bool                    cont = 0;
00061         int rc;
00062 
00063         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00064         nodemap = nodemap_lookup(m->private);
00065         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00066         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
00067                 rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap);
00068                 CERROR("cannot find nodemap '%s': rc = %d\n",
00069                         (char *)m->private, rc);
00070                 return rc;
00071         }
00072 
00073         seq_printf(m, "[\n");
00074         read_lock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00075         for (node = rb_first(&nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_uidmap); node;
00076                                 node = rb_next(node)) {
00077                 if (cont)
00078                         seq_printf(m, ",\n");
00079                 cont = 1;
00080                 idmap = rb_entry(node, struct lu_idmap, id_client_to_fs);
00081                 if (idmap != NULL)
00082                         seq_printf(m, " { idtype: uid, client_id: %u, "
00083                                    "fs_id: %u }", idmap->id_client,
00084                                    idmap->id_fs);
00085         }
00086         for (node = rb_first(&nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_gidmap);
00087                                 node; node = rb_next(node)) {
00088                 if (cont)
00089                         seq_printf(m, ",\n");
00090                 idmap = rb_entry(node, struct lu_idmap, id_client_to_fs);
00091                 if (idmap != NULL)
00092                         seq_printf(m, " { idtype: gid, client_id: %u, "
00093                                    "fs_id: %u }", idmap->id_client,
00094                                    idmap->id_fs);
00095         }
00096         read_unlock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00097         seq_printf(m, "\n");
00098         seq_printf(m, "]\n");
00099 
00100         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00101         return 0;
00102 }
00103 
00111 static int nodemap_idmap_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00112 {
00113         return single_open(file, nodemap_idmap_show, PDE_DATA(inode));
00114 }
00115 
00123 static int nodemap_ranges_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00124 {
00125         struct lu_nodemap               *nodemap;
00126         struct lu_nid_range             *range;
00127         struct interval_node_extent     ext;
00128         char                            start_nidstr[LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE];
00129         char                            end_nidstr[LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE];
00130         bool                            cont = false;
00131         int rc;
00132 
00133         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00134         nodemap = nodemap_lookup(m->private);
00135         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
00136                 mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00137                 rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap);
00138                 CERROR("cannot find nodemap '%s': rc = %d\n",
00139                         (char *)m->private, rc);
00140                 return rc;
00141         }
00142 
00143         seq_printf(m, "[\n");
00144         down_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00145         list_for_each_entry(range, &nodemap->nm_ranges, rn_list) {
00146                 if (cont)
00147                         seq_printf(m, ",\n");
00148                 cont = 1;
00149                 ext = range->rn_node.in_extent;
00150                 libcfs_nid2str_r(ext.start, start_nidstr, sizeof(start_nidstr));
00151                 libcfs_nid2str_r(ext.end, end_nidstr, sizeof(end_nidstr));
00152                 seq_printf(m, " { id: %u, start_nid: %s, end_nid: %s }",
00153                            range->rn_id, start_nidstr, end_nidstr);
00154         }
00155         up_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00156         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00157         seq_printf(m, "\n");
00158         seq_printf(m, "]\n");
00159 
00160         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00161         return 0;
00162 }
00163 
00171 static int nodemap_ranges_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00172 {
00173         return single_open(file, nodemap_ranges_show, PDE_DATA(inode));
00174 }

00183 static int nodemap_exports_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00184 {
00185         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap;
00186         struct obd_export *exp;
00187         char nidstr[LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE] = "<unknown>";
00188         int rc;
00189 
00190         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00191         nodemap = nodemap_lookup(m->private);
00192         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00193         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
00194                 rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap);
00195                 CERROR("cannot find nodemap '%s': rc = %d\n",
00196                         (char *)m->private, rc);
00197                 return rc;
00198         }
00199 
00200         seq_printf(m, "[\n");
00201 
00202         mutex_lock(&nodemap->nm_member_list_lock);
00203         list_for_each_entry(exp, &nodemap->nm_member_list,
00204                             exp_target_data.ted_nodemap_member) {
00205                 if (exp->exp_connection != NULL)
00206                         libcfs_nid2str_r(exp->exp_connection->c_peer.nid,
00207                                          nidstr, sizeof(nidstr));
00208 
00209                 seq_printf(m, " { nid: %s, uuid: %s },",
00210                            nidstr, exp->exp_client_uuid.uuid);
00211         }
00212         mutex_unlock(&nodemap->nm_member_list_lock);
00213 
00214         seq_printf(m, "\n");
00215         seq_printf(m, "]\n");
00216 
00217         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00218         return 0;
00219 }

00228 static int nodemap_exports_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00229 {
00230         return single_open(file, nodemap_exports_show, PDE_DATA(inode));
00231 }

00240 static int nodemap_active_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00241 {
00242         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", (unsigned int)nodemap_active);
00243         return 0;
00244 }
00245 
00256 static ssize_t
00257 nodemap_active_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00258                          size_t count, loff_t *off)
00259 {
00260         char                    active_string[NODEMAP_LPROC_FLAG_LEN + 1];
00261         long unsigned int       active;
00262         int                     rc;
00263 
00264         if (count == 0)
00265                 return 0;
00266 
00267         if (count >= sizeof(active_string))
00268                 return -EINVAL;
00269 
00270         if (copy_from_user(active_string, buffer, count))
00271                 return -EFAULT;
00272 
00273         active_string[count] = '\0';
00274         rc = kstrtoul(active_string, 10, &active);
00275         if (rc != 0)
00276                 return -EINVAL;
00277 
00278         nodemap_activate(active);
00279 
00280         return count;
00281 }
00282 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(nodemap_active);
00283 
00291 static int nodemap_id_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00292 {
00293         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap;
00294 
00295         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00296         nodemap = nodemap_lookup(m->private);
00297         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00298         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
00299                 int rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap);
00300                 CERROR("cannot find nodemap '%s': rc = %d\n",
00301                         (char *)m->private, rc);
00302                 return rc;
00303         }
00304 
00305         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", nodemap->nm_id);
00306         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00307         return 0;
00308 }
00309 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(nodemap_id);

00409                 return rc;

00427 static int nodemap_proc_read_flag(const char __user *buffer,
00428                                   unsigned long count, unsigned int *flag_p)
00429 {
00430         char                    scratch[NODEMAP_LPROC_FLAG_LEN + 1];
00431         long unsigned int       flag_buf;
00432         int                     rc;
00433 
00434         if (count == 0)
00435                 return 0;
00436 
00437         if (count >= sizeof(scratch))
00438                 return -EINVAL;
00439 
00440         if (copy_from_user(scratch, buffer, count))
00441                 return -EFAULT;
00442 
00443         scratch[count] = '\0';
00444         rc = kstrtoul(scratch, 10, &flag_buf);
00445         if (rc != 0)
00446                 return -EINVAL;
00447 
00448         *flag_p = flag_buf;
00449 
00450         return count;
00451 }
00452 
00463 static ssize_t
00464 nodemap_squash_uid_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00465                              size_t count, loff_t *off)
00466 {
00467         char                     squash[NODEMAP_LPROC_ID_LEN + 1];
00468         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
00469         long unsigned int        squash_uid;
00470         int                      rc;
00471 
00472         if (count == 0)
00473                 return 0;
00474 
00475         if (count >= sizeof(squash))
00476                 return -EINVAL;
00477 
00478         if (copy_from_user(squash, buffer, count))
00479                 return -EFAULT;
00480 
00481         squash[count] = '\0';
00482         rc = kstrtoul(squash, 10, &squash_uid);
00483         if (rc != 0)
00484                 return -EINVAL;
00485 
00486         rc = nodemap_set_squash_uid(m->private, squash_uid);
00487         if (rc != 0)
00488                 return rc;
00489 
00490         return count;
00491 }
00492 
00503 static ssize_t
00504 nodemap_squash_gid_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00505                              size_t count, loff_t *off)
00506 {
00507         char                     squash[NODEMAP_LPROC_ID_LEN + 1];
00508         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
00509         long unsigned int        squash_gid;
00510         int                      rc;
00511 
00512         if (count == 0)
00513                 return 0;
00514 
00515         if (count >= sizeof(squash))
00516                 return -EINVAL;
00517 
00518         if (copy_from_user(squash, buffer, count))
00519                 return -EFAULT;
00520 
00521         squash[count] = '\0';
00522         rc = kstrtoul(squash, 10, &squash_gid);
00523         if (rc != 0)
00524                 return -EINVAL;
00525 
00526         rc = nodemap_set_squash_gid(m->private, squash_gid);
00527         if (rc != 0)
00528                 return rc;
00529 
00530         return count;
00531 }

00543 static ssize_t
00544 nodemap_trusted_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00545                           size_t count, loff_t *off)
00546 {
00547         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
00548         int                     flags;
00549         int                     rc;
00550 
00551         rc = nodemap_proc_read_flag(buffer, count, &flags);
00552         if (rc < 0)
00553                 return rc;
00554 
00555         rc = nodemap_set_trust_client_ids(m->private, flags);
00556         if (rc != 0)
00557                 return rc;
00558 
00559         return count;
00560 }

00572 static ssize_t
00573 nodemap_admin_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00574                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00575 {
00576         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
00577         int                     flags;
00578         int                     rc;
00579 
00580         rc = nodemap_proc_read_flag(buffer, count, &flags);
00581         if (rc < 0)
00582                 return rc;
00583 
00584         rc = nodemap_set_allow_root(m->private, flags);
00585         if (rc != 0)
00586                 return rc;
00587 
00588         return count;
00589 }

00601 static ssize_t
00602 lprocfs_add_nodemap_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00603                               size_t count, loff_t *off)
00604 {
00605         char    nodemap_name[LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME_LENGTH + 1];
00606         char    *cpybuf = NULL;
00607         char    *pos;
00608         int     rc;
00609 
00610         if (count == 0)
00611                 return 0;
00612 
00613         if (count >= sizeof(nodemap_name))
00614                 return -EINVAL;
00615 
00616         if (copy_from_user(nodemap_name, buffer, count))
00617                 return -EFAULT;
00618 
00619         nodemap_name[count] = '\0';
00620 
00621         cpybuf = nodemap_name;
00622         pos = strsep(&cpybuf, " \n");
00623         if (pos == NULL)
00624                 return -EINVAL;
00625 
00626         rc = nodemap_add(nodemap_name);
00627         if (rc == 0)
00628                 rc = count;
00629 
00630         return rc;
00631 }
00632 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(nodemap, add_nodemap);
00633 
00644 static ssize_t
00645 lprocfs_del_nodemap_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00646                               size_t count, loff_t *off)
00647 {
00648         char    nodemap_name[LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME_LENGTH + 1];
00649         char    *cpybuf = NULL;
00650         char    *pos;
00651         int     rc = count;
00652 
00653         if (count == 0)
00654                 return 0;
00655 
00656         if (count >= sizeof(nodemap_name))
00657                 return -EINVAL;
00658 
00659         if (copy_from_user(nodemap_name, buffer, count))
00660                 return -EFAULT;
00661 
00662         nodemap_name[count] = '\0';
00663 
00664         cpybuf = nodemap_name;
00665         pos = strsep(&cpybuf, " \n");
00666         if (pos == NULL)
00667                 return -EINVAL;
00668 
00669         rc = nodemap_del(nodemap_name);
00670         if (rc == 0)
00671                 rc = count;
00672 
00673         return rc;
00674 
00675 }
00676 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(nodemap, del_nodemap);
00677 
00686 static int parse_nids(char *rangestr, lnet_nid_t nids[2])
00687 {
00688         struct list_head        nidlist;
00689         char                    nidstr[2][LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE];
00690         char                    nidrange_str[2 * LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE + 2];
00691         int                     rc = 0;
00692 
00693         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&nidlist);
00694 
00695         if (cfs_parse_nidlist(rangestr, strlen(rangestr),
00696             &nidlist) <= 0)
00697                 return -EINVAL;
00698 
00699         if (!cfs_nidrange_is_contiguous(&nidlist))
00700                 return -EINVAL;
00701 
00702         cfs_nidrange_find_min_max(&nidlist, nidstr[0], nidstr[1],
00703                                   LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE);
00704         snprintf(nidrange_str, sizeof(nidrange_str), "%s:%s",
00705                 nidstr[0], nidstr[1]);
00706 
00707         rc = nodemap_parse_range(nidrange_str, nids);
00708         if (rc != 0)
00709                 return -EINVAL;
00710 
00711         cfs_free_nidlist(&nidlist);
00712 
00713         return 0;
00714 }
00715 
00726 static ssize_t
00727 lprocfs_add_nodemap_range_seq_write(struct file *file,
00728                                     const char __user *buffer,
00729                                     size_t count, loff_t *off)
00730 {
00731         char                    name_range[LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME_LENGTH +
00732                                            LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE * 2 + 2];
00733         char                    *cpybuf = NULL;
00734         char                    *name;
00735         char                    *rangestr = NULL;
00736         lnet_nid_t              nids[2];
00737         int                     rc;
00738 
00739         if (count == 0)
00740                 return 0;
00741 
00742         if (count >= sizeof(name_range))
00743                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00744 
00745         if (copy_from_user(name_range, buffer, count))
00746                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00747 
00748         name_range[count] = '\0';
00749 
00750         cpybuf = name_range;
00751         name = strsep(&cpybuf, " ");
00752         if (name == NULL)
00753                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00754 
00755         rangestr = strsep(&cpybuf, " \n");
00756         if (rangestr == NULL)
00757                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00758 
00759         rc = parse_nids(rangestr, nids);
00760         if (rc != 0)
00761                 GOTO(out, rc = rc);
00762 
00763         rc = nodemap_add_range(name, nids);
00764         if (rc != 0)
00765                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00766 
00767         if (rc == 0)
00768                 rc = count;
00769 
00770 out:
00771         return rc;
00772 }
00773 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(nodemap, add_nodemap_range);
00774 
00785 static ssize_t
00786 lprocfs_del_nodemap_range_seq_write(struct file *file,
00787                                     const char __user *buffer,
00788                                     size_t count, loff_t *off)
00789 {
00790         char                    name_range[LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME_LENGTH +
00791                                            LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE * 2 + 2];
00792         char                    *cpybuf = NULL;
00793         char                    *name;
00794         char                    *rangestr = NULL;
00795         lnet_nid_t              nids[2];
00796         int                     rc;
00797 
00798         if (count == 0)
00799                 return 0;
00800 
00801         if (count >= sizeof(name_range))
00802                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00803 
00804         if (copy_from_user(name_range, buffer, count))
00805                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00806 
00807         name_range[count] = '\0';
00808 
00809         cpybuf = name_range;
00810         name = strsep(&cpybuf, " ");
00811         if (name == NULL)
00812                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00813 
00814         rangestr = strsep(&cpybuf, " \n");
00815         if (rangestr == NULL)
00816                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00817 
00818         rc = parse_nids(rangestr, nids);
00819         if (rc != 0)
00820                 GOTO(out, rc = rc);
00821 
00822         rc = nodemap_del_range(name, nids);
00823         if (rc != 0)
00824                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00825 
00826         if (rc == 0)
00827                 rc = count;
00828 
00829 out:
00830         return rc;
00831 }
00832 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(nodemap, del_nodemap_range);
00833 
00844 static ssize_t
00845 lprocfs_add_nodemap_idmap_seq_write(struct file *file,
00846                                     const char __user *buffer,
00847                                     size_t count, loff_t *off)
00848 {
00849         char                    name_idmapstr[LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME_LENGTH + 16];
00850         char                    *cpybuf = NULL;
00851         char                    *name;
00852         char                    *idtypestr = NULL;
00853         char                    *idmapstr = NULL;
00854         __u32                   idmap[2];
00855         int                     rc = count;
00856 
00857         if (count == 0)
00858                 return 0;
00859 
00860         if (count >= sizeof(name_idmapstr))
00861                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00862 
00863         if (copy_from_user(name_idmapstr, buffer, count))
00864                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00865 
00866         name_idmapstr[count] = '\0';
00867 
00868         cpybuf = name_idmapstr;
00869         name = strsep(&cpybuf, " ");
00870         if (name == NULL)
00871                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00872 
00873         idtypestr = strsep(&cpybuf, " ");
00874         if (idtypestr == NULL)
00875                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00876 
00877         idmapstr = strsep(&cpybuf, " \n");
00878         if (idmapstr == NULL)
00879                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00880 
00881         rc = nodemap_parse_idmap(idmapstr, idmap);
00882         if (rc != 0)
00883                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00884 
00885         if (strcmp(idtypestr, "uid") == 0)
00886                 rc = nodemap_add_idmap(name, NODEMAP_UID, idmap);
00887         else if (strcmp(idtypestr, "gid") == 0)
00888                 rc = nodemap_add_idmap(name, NODEMAP_GID, idmap);
00889         else
00890                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00891 
00892         if (rc != 0)
00893                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00894 
00895         if (rc == 0)
00896                 rc = count;
00897 
00898 out:
00899         return rc;
00900 }
00901 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(nodemap, add_nodemap_idmap);
00902 
00913 static ssize_t
00914 lprocfs_del_nodemap_idmap_seq_write(struct file *file,
00915                                     const char __user *buffer,
00916                                     size_t count, loff_t *off)
00917 {
00918         char                    name_idmapstr[LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME_LENGTH + 16];
00919         char                    *cpybuf = NULL;
00920         char                    *name;
00921         char                    *idtypestr = NULL;
00922         char                    *idmapstr = NULL;
00923         __u32                   idmap[2];
00924         int                     rc = count;
00925 
00926         if (count == 0)
00927                 return 0;
00928 
00929         if (count >= sizeof(name_idmapstr))
00930                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00931 
00932         if (copy_from_user(name_idmapstr, buffer, count))
00933                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00934 
00935         name_idmapstr[count] = '\0';
00936 
00937         cpybuf = name_idmapstr;
00938         name = strsep(&cpybuf, " ");
00939         if (name == NULL)
00940                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00941 
00942         idtypestr = strsep(&cpybuf, " ");
00943         if (idtypestr == NULL)
00944                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00945 
00946         idmapstr = strsep(&cpybuf, " \n");
00947         if (idmapstr == NULL)
00948                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00949 
00950         rc = nodemap_parse_idmap(idmapstr, idmap);
00951         if (rc != 0)
00952                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00953 
00954         if (strcmp(idtypestr, "uid") == 0)
00955                 rc = nodemap_del_idmap(name, NODEMAP_UID, idmap);
00956         else if (strcmp(idtypestr, "gid") == 0)
00957                 rc = nodemap_del_idmap(name, NODEMAP_GID, idmap);
00958         else
00959                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00960 
00961         if (rc != 0)
00962                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00963 
00964         if (rc == 0)
00965                 rc = count;
00966 
00967 out:
00968         return rc;
00969 }
00970 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(nodemap, del_nodemap_idmap);
00971 #endif /* NODEMAP_PROC_DEBUG */

01109 
01115 int nodemap_procfs_init(void)
01116 {
01117         int rc = 0;
01118 
01119         proc_lustre_nodemap_root = lprocfs_register(LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME,
01120                                                     proc_lustre_root,
01121                                                     lprocfs_nm_module_vars,
01122                                                     NULL);
01123         if (IS_ERR(proc_lustre_nodemap_root)) {
01124                 rc = PTR_ERR(proc_lustre_nodemap_root);
01125                 CERROR("cannot create 'nodemap' directory: rc = %d\n",
01126                        rc);
01127                 proc_lustre_nodemap_root = NULL;
01128         }
01129         return rc;
01130 }
01131 
01135 void nodemap_procfs_exit(void)
01136 {
01137         struct nodemap_pde *nm_pde;
01138         struct nodemap_pde *tmp;
01139 
01140         lprocfs_remove(&proc_lustre_nodemap_root);
01141         list_for_each_entry_safe(nm_pde, tmp, &nodemap_pde_list,
01142                                  npe_list_member) {
01143                 list_del(&nm_pde->npe_list_member);
01144                 OBD_FREE_PTR(nm_pde);
01145         }
01146 }
01147 
01151 void lprocfs_nodemap_remove(struct nodemap_pde *nm_pde)
01152 {
01153         lprocfs_remove(&nm_pde->npe_proc_entry);
01154         list_del(&nm_pde->npe_list_member);
01155         OBD_FREE_PTR(nm_pde);
01156 }
01157 
01165 int lprocfs_nodemap_register(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap, bool is_default)
01166 {
01167         struct nodemap_pde      *nm_entry;
01168         int                      rc = 0;
01169 
01170         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(nm_entry);
01171         if (nm_entry == NULL)
01172                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
01173 
01174         nm_entry->npe_proc_entry = proc_mkdir(nodemap->nm_name,
01175                                               proc_lustre_nodemap_root);
01176         if (IS_ERR(nm_entry->npe_proc_entry))
01177                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(nm_entry->npe_proc_entry));
01178 
01179         snprintf(nm_entry->npe_name, sizeof(nm_entry->npe_name), "%s",
01180                  nodemap->nm_name);
01181 
01182         /* Use the nodemap name as stored on the PDE as the private data. This
01183          * is so a nodemap struct can be replaced without updating the proc
01184          * entries.
01185          */
01186         rc = lprocfs_add_vars(nm_entry->npe_proc_entry,
01187                               (is_default ? lprocfs_default_nodemap_vars :
01188                                             lprocfs_nodemap_vars),
01189                               nm_entry->npe_name);
01190         if (rc != 0)
01191                 lprocfs_remove(&nm_entry->npe_proc_entry);
01192         else
01193                 list_add(&nm_entry->npe_list_member, &nodemap_pde_list);
01194 
01195 out:
01196         if (rc != 0) {
01197                 CERROR("cannot create 'nodemap/%s': rc = %d\n",
01198                        nodemap->nm_name, rc);
01199                 if (nm_entry != NULL) {
01200                         OBD_FREE_PTR(nm_entry);
01201                         nm_entry = NULL;
01202                 }
01203         }
01204 
01205         nodemap->nm_pde_data = nm_entry;
01206 
01207         return rc;
01208 }
